snippet: Jeff Gordon grabbed the top starting spot for Sunday’s race at Talladega Superspeedway in Alabama with a lap at 191.623 miles per hour in his Hendrick Motorsports Chevrolet.
abstract: Jeff Gordon earns pole position for Nascar race at Talladega Superspeedway, his first starting sport since the same race a year earlier; other auto racing news noted.
lead_paragraph: Jeff Gordon grabbed the top starting spot for Sunday’s race at Talladega Superspeedway in Alabama with a lap at 191.623 miles per hour in his Hendrick Motorsports Chevrolet.

headline.main: Gordon Grabs Pole Position at Talladega
headline.print_headline: Gordon Grabs Pole Position at Talladega
